pageTitle: Albany City School District Average Teacher Salary & How to Become a Teacher
textBeforeTable: The average teacher salary in Albany City School District is $51,766. Average Teacher Salary in Albany City School District Teacher Awards Resources Articles Blog Become a Teacher Average State Salary
textAfterTable: How to Become a Teacher in Albany City School District To learn how to become a teacher in the Albany City School District, read our how to become a teacher in New York article. For average salary information, read our average teacher salary in New York article. General Facts Staff: 1,548 Full time teachers: 704 Pupil to teacher ratio: 11 to 1 Teacher assistants (instructional aides): 245 Instructional Coordinators: 8 Elementary Teachers: 261 Kindergarten Teachers: 38 Pre-K Teachers: 17 High School Teachers: 240 Pre-K to 12 Students: 8,202 Financial Statistics for Albany City School District Revenue Revenue from local sources: $99,943,000 Revenue from state sources: $72,887,000 Revenue from federal sources: $16,651,000 Total revenue: $189,481,000 Expenses Expenditures on instruction: $114,505,000 Expenditures on teacher salary: $91,413,000 Expenditures on teacher benefits: $34,343,000 Expenditures per student: $2,126,000 Total expenditures: $198,280,000 Breakdown of Teacher Salary Expenses Teacher salary expenses on regular education: $33,804,000 Teacher salary expenses on special education: $9,547,000 Teacher salary expenses on vocational education: $1,085,000 Information on Schools within Albany City School District Elementary Schools within the Albany City School District School Students Student to Teacher Ratio Full Time Certified Teachers Lowest Grade Offered Highest Grade Offered Albany School Of
